name: SARSCoronavirus2SGeneQualitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 S Gene, Qualitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative detection of nucleic acids within the S gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the S gene of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
